Keyword.Name: NewCombineVariable
Keyword.Description: New Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable, NewCombineVariable is only different number of parameter with the old one

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine, range input: 2 --> 17

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step
Keyword.Param: Replace SQL file in order to Delete user

Keyword.Name: ReplaceStringInFile
Keyword.Description: Replace String By String in a file (Images\Utils\1.png)

Param.Name: sSourceFilePath
Param.Description: Source File name need to replace string by string , LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Name: sStringNeedToReplace
Param.Description: String need to find and replace in file

Param.Name: sNewString
Param.Description: New string need to replace string found above

Param.Name: sDestinationFilePath
Param.Description: KW will Save As new file after replace, give your out file

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ExecuteSQLFile(SQLFilePath) means by pass all SQL Queries above and execute the sql file

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Param.Name: sVerifyTitle
Param.Description: Title need to verify by contains way, null means by pass verify it

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Login to Admin Dev Page (Images\AdminDev\Login\1.png)

Keyword.Name: GoToAdminUserManagementPage
Keyword.Description: Go To Page

Keyword.Name: AdminSiteCreateUser
Keyword.Description: UserPage, Use to create new User on Admin Site

Param.Name: sRole
Param.Description: User Role , Separate by [;] symbol. Note, When sRole = Administrator, It's mean that Role Site Dashboards will be checked automatically

Param.Name: sIsClicked
Param.Description: If you want to Click on Create Button then set sIsClicked = 'true', if you want to validate all required message then set it [validate], otherwise set to 'false' it will canceled create user

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: Message displayed when user create successfully

Keyword.Name: AdminSiteCreateUser
Keyword.Description: Use to create new User on Admin Site (Images\AdminDev\UserManagement\1.png)

Param.Name: sRole
Param.Description: User Role , Separate by [;] symbol. Note, When sRole = Administrator, It's mean that Role Site Dashboards will be checked automatically

Param.Name: sIsClicked
Param.Description: If you want to Click on Create Button then set sIsClicked = 'true', if you want to validate all required message then set it [validate], otherwise set to 'false' it will canceled create user

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: Message displayed when user create successfully

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Expected(success|unsuccess) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Param.Name: sVerifyTitle
Param.Description: Title need to verify by contains way, null means by pass verify it

Keyword.Name: Refresh
Keyword.Description: Refresh current page

Keyword.Name: LoginEmail365
Keyword.Description: Login To Webmail (Images\WebMail\Login\2.png)

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Keyword.Param: An account has been created for you

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Keyword.Name: SetNewPasswordEmail365
Keyword.Description: Set new password for a user after click on the link reset password in email, this keyword should using after verify Email by KW CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword and sIsClick = true

Param.Name: sVerifyEmail
Param.Description: Email address of user need to verify, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sNewPassword
Param.Description: Input new password, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sConfirmNewPassword
Param.Description: Input confirm new password, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckButtonCreateStatus
Param.Description: Check status of button Create, enable or disable, null means by pass input

Keyword.Name: GoToAdminUserManagementPage
Keyword.Description: Go To Page

Keyword.Name: AdminSiteEditUser
Keyword.Description: Use for Edit an User, In here we use Email for filter user because It's uniqule. Don't missed Email field. (Images\AdminDev\UserManagement\2.png)

Param.Name: sNewRoles
Param.Description: User New Roles , Separate by [;] symbol. Note, When sRole = Administrator, It's mean that Role Site Dashboards will be checked automatically

Param.Name: sIsEnable
Param.Description: If you want to Enable this User then Set it to "true" otherwise is "false"

Param.Name: sIsSaved
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then set sIsSaved = 'true', if you want to validate all required message then set it [validate] otherwise set to 'false' it will canceled Edit user

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: Message displayed when user create successfully
